ruleSearch.author: $.author
ruleSearch.bookList:
<js>
h = String(source.getKey().match(/([^\#]+)\#/)[1]);
q = "?q=" + encodeURIComponent(java.get('key'));

c = "Hm_lvt_="+~~(new Date().getTime()/1e3);

head = {
	accept: "application/json",
	"accept-language": "zh-CN,en-US;q=0.9",
	referer: String(h+"s"+q),
	cookie: String(c)
}

hm = ";hm="+java.head(h+"/user/hm.html"+q, head).cookies().hm;
head.cookie = String(head.cookie+hm);

Get = java.get(h+"/user/search.html"+q, head);
JSON.parse(Get.body())
.map(_=>JSON.stringify(_));
</js>
ruleSearch.name: $.articlename

ruleBookInfo.lastChapter:
{{@@[property$=chapter_name]@content}}･{{@@[property$=update_time]@content##\s.*}}
@js:result
.replace("••","")
.replace(/^(\d+).第/,'第')
.replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(\{（｛【].*[求含理更谢乐发推票盟补加字Kk\/].*/g,'')
.replace(/^(\d+)[、．]第.+章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?\d+/,'$1')
.replace(/^(\d+)、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?第.+章/,'$1')
.replace(/第\s(.+)\s章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/.*(chapter|Chapter)\s?(\d+)\s?/,'$1 $2 ')
.replace(/\(.+\)/,'')
.replace(/\[|。/,'')
.replace(/第([零一二两三四五六七八九十百千]+)章/g,java.toNumChapter(result))
##(章)([^\s]+)(\s·)##$1 $2$3
ruleBookInfo.name: [property$=book_name]@content

ruleContent.replaceRegex: ##看《{{book.name}}》最新更新章节上9x.com 分享越多，更新越快。|<!--go-->|千千.*最新章节！|<!--over-->|\~经\^\^小\！说\レ|首发\]|永久网址.*请牢记！

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>eval(String(source.bookSourceComment));
uri = String(uri)
    .replace('chapterList', 'content')
    .replace('.html', '/');
_ = {
    result: {
        list: []
    }
};
push = __ => _.result.list.push(__);
$.list.map($ => {
    if ($.name) {
        push({
            name: $.name,
            volume: true
        });
    }
    $.list.map($ => {
        if ($.has_content == 1) {
            url = java.base64Encode(uri + $.id + '.html');
            $.url = `data:;base64,${url},{"type":"${type}"}`;
            return push($);
        }
    })
})
JSON.stringify(_);
</js>$.result.list[*]
